issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

components.name: CBO
components.description: All issues dealing with Hive's cost based optimizer and its interaction with Optiq

fields.description:
bq.Test case is( JOIN sub tree had been flatten after CBO in final plan stage of calcite optimizer)  
{code:sql}
--set  hive.cbo.enable=true;

--ANALYZE TABLE customer COMPUTE STATISTICS for columns;
--ANALYZE TABLE orders COMPUTE STATISTICS for columns;
--ANALYZE TABLE lineitem COMPUTE STATISTICS for columns;
--ANALYZE TABLE region COMPUTE STATISTICS for columns;
--ANALYZE TABLE supplier COMPUTE STATISTICS for columns;
--ANALYZE TABLE partsupp COMPUTE STATISTICS for columns;
--ANALYZE TABLE part COMPUTE STATISTICS for columns;
--ANALYZE TABLE nation COMPUTE STATISTICS for columns;

explain select
  o_year, sum(case when nation = 'BRAZIL' then volume else 0.0 end) / sum(volume) as mkt_share
from
  (
select
  year(o_orderdate) as o_year, l_extendedprice * (1-l_discount) as volume,
  n2.n_name as nation
    from
    nation n1 join region r
      on n1.n_regionkey = r.r_regionkey and r.r_name = 'AMERICA'
    join customer c
      on c.c_nationkey = n1.n_nationkey
    join orders o
      on c.c_custkey = o.o_custkey
    join lineitem l
      on l.l_orderkey = o.o_orderkey and o.o_orderdate >= '1995-01-01'
         and o.o_orderdate < '1996-12-31'
    join part p
      on p.p_partkey = l.l_partkey and p.p_type = 'ECONOMY ANODIZED STEEL'
    join supplier s
      on s.s_suppkey = l.l_suppkey
    join  nation n2
      on s.s_nationkey = n2.n_nationkey
  ) all_nation
group by o_year
order by o_year;
{code}
bq. This test from had modified q8 in TPC-H_full . Uncomment  could enable CBO. twice run results are same :
{quote}

bq. Is CBO invalid? 

{color:red}
 The Join order had been modified in final  plan by Calcite .
{color}
{noformat}
Final plan after modifier
 HiveSort(sort0=[$0], dir0=[ASC])
  HiveProject(o_year=[$0], mkt_share=[/($1, $2)])
    HiveAggregate(group=[{0}], agg#0=[sum($1)], agg#1=[sum($2)])
      HiveProject($f0=[$0], $f1=[when(=($2, 'BRAZIL'), $1, 0E0)], $f2=[$1])
        HiveProject(o_year=[year($8)], volume=[*($12, -(CAST(1):DOUBLE, $13))], nation=[$19])
          HiveProject(n_nationkey=[$16], n_regionkey=[$17], r_regionkey=[$18], r_name=[$19], c_custkey=[$14], c_nationkey=[$15], o_orderkey=[$11], o_custkey=[$12], o_orderdate=[$13], l_orderkey=[$0], l_partkey=[$1], l_suppkey=[$2], l_extendedprice=[$3], l_discount=[$4], p_partkey=[$5], p_type=[$6], s_suppkey=[$7], s_nationkey=[$8], n_nationkey0=[$9], n_name=[$10])
            HiveJoin(condition=[=($0, $11)], joinType=[inner])
              HiveJoin(condition=[=($7, $2)], joinType=[inner])
                HiveJoin(condition=[=($5, $1)], joinType=[inner])
                  HiveProject(l_orderkey=[$0], l_partkey=[$1], l_suppkey=[$2], l_extendedprice=[$5], l_discount=[$6])
                    HiveTableScan(table=[[default.lineitem]])
                  HiveProject(p_partkey=[$0], p_type=[$4])
                    HiveFilter(condition=[=($4, 'ECONOMY ANODIZED STEEL')])
                      HiveTableScan(table=[[default.part]])
                HiveProject(s_suppkey=[$0], s_nationkey=[$1], n_nationkey=[$2], n_name=[$3])
                  HiveJoin(condition=[=($1, $2)], joinType=[inner])
                    HiveProject(s_suppkey=[$0], s_nationkey=[$3])
                      HiveTableScan(table=[[default.supplier]])
                    HiveProject(n_nationkey=[$0], n_name=[$1])
                      HiveTableScan(table=[[default.nation]])
              HiveProject(o_orderkey=[$0], o_custkey=[$1], o_orderdate=[$2], c_custkey=[$3], c_nationkey=[$4], n_nationkey=[$5],n_regionkey=[$6], r_regionkey=[$7], r_name=[$8])
                HiveJoin(condition=[=($4, $5)], joinType=[inner])
                  HiveJoin(condition=[=($3, $1)], joinType=[inner])
                    HiveProject(o_orderkey=[$0], o_custkey=[$1], o_orderdate=[$4])
                      HiveFilter(condition=[AND(>=($4, '1995-01-01'), <($4, '1996-12-31'))])
                        HiveTableScan(table=[[default.orders]])
                    HiveProject(c_custkey=[$0], c_nationkey=[$3])
                      HiveTableScan(table=[[default.customer]])
                  HiveProject(n_nationkey=[$0], n_regionkey=[$1], r_regionkey=[$2], r_name=[$3])
                    HiveJoin(condition=[=($1, $2)], joinType=[inner])
                      HiveProject(n_nationkey=[$0], n_regionkey=[$2])
                        HiveTableScan(table=[[default.nation]])
                      HiveProject(r_regionkey=[$0], r_name=[$1])
                        HiveFilter(condition=[=($1, 'AMERICA')])
                          HiveTableScan(table=[[default.region]])
{noformat}
fields.summary: Having the consistent physical execution plan  , which using explain command  with disable CBO and enable CBO.

comments.body:
[~asko] What is the issue here?
If the issue you are raising is the physical plans are different with CBO ON/OFF then it is expected as the join order may change.
